about_me.name: Simon Klostermaier
about_me.about_me_description: I am an upcoming filmmaker currently based in Paris and Munich with a comprehensive background in Music Video and Shortfilm-Productions. I would love to hear about the projects you dream of realizing! So send me a DM or an E-Mail and let's make it happen!

projects.project_description: Chuck, Chuck, its' your cousin. Your cousin Marvin Berry, you know that new sound you're lookin for, well listen to this. Then how am I supposed to ever meet anybody.
